item.title: Supreme Court Denies Request to Revisit Same-Sex Marriage Decision
item.description: Kim Davis, a Kentucky county clerk who refused to issue same-sex marriage licenses, had asked the court to reconsider its landmark 2015 opinion.

item.title: The FDA will lift warnings on hormone therapy for menopause
item.description: Hormone therapy drugs have carried box warning labels for years. The Food and Drug Administration is removing them, saying the risks were overstated.

item.title: Explosion Reported Near Red Fort in New Delhi
item.description: India’s top security official said the cause of the blast, near the Red Fort in the capital, was still being investigated.
